Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
The traditional workplace is like the "back office" of OpenCms. It provides two main views:

  • Explorer view of the VFS
  • Administration view, a GUI for most administrative tasks.

The workplace typically is not used for content editing or structuring of a website. For that, you can use the ADE editors. But, the template developer and also the system administrator will normally work with the traditional workplace.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: The tradtional workplace is the powerful "back office" of OpenCms. Here template developers and system administrators are in the right place. For other users, the ADE views will be the places to work in.
